messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Ann Holtom
messages.content: Local campaigner who works all year round, not just at election time. A strong local champion for Erdington. Because Erdington deserves better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guaranteeing that mental health is treated no less seriously than physical health.
Delivering £2.5 billion tax cut for ordinary workers.

issues.economy: The books should balance by 2018 and we will introduce a mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million. We will also cut the deficit further and invest £8 billion into the NHS.
issues.education: We will protect education spending, extend free school meals and cut class sizes to 20.
issues.health: Guaranteeing that mental health is treated no less seriously than physical health.

housing.content: Introduce a mansion tax on properties over £2 million.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ann Holtom - Local campaigner who works all year round, not just at election time.

images.caption: Ann Holtom with supporters and campaign imagery.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also contains a 'promise of action' with steps for a fairer Britain, such as balancing the books by 2018, cutting income tax by £400, introducing a mansion tax on properties worth over £2 million, providing 2 million apprenticeships, protecting education spending, cutting class sizes to 20, and delivering £2.5 billion in a tax cut for workers.
